members.name: New Project
members.description: ng new PROJECT-NAME -> cd PROJECT-NAME -> ng serve

members.name: Example
members.description: ng g s services/backendApi --module=app.module => This will create a new 'services' folder in the src/app folder and also add the service name in the providers section (providers: [BackendApiService]) of the app.module.ts file.

members.name: Reading local json files
members.description: Following is the folder structure to read local json file: Angular 2 => root / src / data / file.json, Angular 4 => root / data / file.json

members.name: Git commit
members.description: git add * => git commit -m 'Add your comments' => git push => git status
